comment.author: 김성욱
comment.content: Just curious... $2000 ~ 3000 per 2 wks, month or yr?

post.content:
Friend of mine is looking for Calling Card sales Rep. It does not have to be long term. I know it is not IT related but you never know. Doing something is alway better than doing nothing.
Salary range: $2000 - $3000+
Anybody interest in let me know
post.title: Sales Position
